class.name: ClippedCamera3D
class.description: This node extends [Camera3D] to add collisions with [Area3D] and/or [PhysicsBody3D] nodes. The camera cannot move through colliding objects.

method.name: add_exception
method.description: Adds a collision exception so the camera does not collide with the specified node.

method.name: add_exception_rid
method.description: Adds a collision exception so the camera does not collide with the specified [RID].

method.name: get_clip_offset
method.description: Returns the distance the camera has been offset due to a collision.

method.name: get_collision_mask_value
method.description: Returns whether or not the specified layer of the [member collision_mask] is enabled, given a [code]layer_number[/code] between 1 and 32.

method.name: remove_exception
method.description: Removes a collision exception with the specified node.

method.name: remove_exception_rid
method.description: Removes a collision exception with the specified [RID].

method.name: set_collision_mask_value
method.description: Based on [code]value[/code], enables or disables the specified layer in the [member collision_mask], given a [code]layer_number[/code] between 1 and 32.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the camera stops on contact with [Area3D]s.
If [code]true[/code], the camera stops on contact with [PhysicsBody3D]s.

The camera's collision mask. Only objects in at least one collision layer matching the mask will be detected. See [url=https://docs.godotengine.org/en/latest/tutorials/physics/physics_introduction.html#collision-layers-and-masks]Collision layers and masks[/url] in the documentation for more information.
The camera's collision margin. The camera can't get closer than this distance to a colliding object.
The camera's process callback. See [enum ClipProcessCallback].

constants.constant: The camera updates with the [code]_physics_process[/code] callback.
The camera updates with the [code]_process[/code] callback.
